place: Via S. Nicolo 30, II, Trieste, Austria
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie I received this morning your letter and my stories. But I cannot find any criticism on them. In addition to answering the letter now on its way you might send me a criticism. I suppose since the house is so little attractive you will be inclined to accept my offer. Grant Richards wrote back to me, asking to be allowed to keep the MS. The new business is his wifeâ€™s and if they succeed in the first season they will be able to undertake non-commercial publication. I wrote to Symons, offering to send him Dubliners Jim
